mapper.select: SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId, FILE_SN AS fileSn, STRE_FILE_NM AS streFileNm, ORIGNL_FILE_NM AS orignlFileNm, FILE_EXTSN AS fileExtsn, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, THUMB_AT AS thumbAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm, FILE_WIDTH AS fileWidth, FILE_HEIGHT AS fileHeight, FILE_TY AS fileTy, FOLDER_ID AS folderId FROM CMS_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} ORDER BY FILE_SN ASC

SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId, FILE_SN AS fileSn, FILE_STRE_COURS AS fileStreCours, STRE_FILE_NM AS streFileNm, ORIGNL_FILE_NM AS orignlFileNm, FILE_EXTSN AS fileExtsn, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, THUMB_AT AS thumbAt, FILE_WIDTH AS fileWidth, FILE_HEIGHT AS fileHeight, FILE_TY AS fileTy, AUTHOR AS author, TAGS AS tags, FOLDER_ID AS folderId FROM CMS_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}

SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId, FILE_SN AS fileSn, STRE_FILE_NM AS streFileNm, ORIGNL_FILE_NM AS orignlFileNm, FILE_EXTSN AS fileExtsn, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, THUMB_AT AS thumbAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm, FILE_WIDTH AS fileWidth, FILE_HEIGHT AS fileHeight, TAGS AS tags, FOLDER_ID AS folderId FROM CMS_FILE_DETAIL
AND FOLDER_ID = #{folderId}
AND ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orignlFileNm}, '%')
AND TAGS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tags}, '%')
AND FILE_EXTSN = #{fileExtsn}
AND THUMB_AT = 'N'
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC

SELECT FOLDER_ID AS folderId, UPPER_FOLDER_ID AS upperFolderId, FOLDER_NM AS folderNm, USE_AT AS useAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm FROM CMS_MEDIA_FOLDER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY FOLDER_NM ASC
SELECT FOLDER_ID AS folderId, UPPER_FOLDER_ID AS upperFolderId, FOLDER_NM AS folderNm, USE_AT AS useAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm FROM CMS_MEDIA_FOLDER WHERE FOLDER_ID = #{folderId}
